message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a good deal, but I want a bit more for myself!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not giving away too much
I'll give you a small share, but I'm getting closer to my goal!
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking the majority
I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm getting greedy now!
I'll give you a tiny crumb, but I'm taking the lion's share
I'll give you a small token, but I'm taking the majority now!
I'll give you a single dollar, but I'm taking almost everything
I'll give you a single dollar, but I'm taking almost everything too!
I'll give you a half-dollar, but I'm taking almost all the rest
I'll give you a half-dollar, but I'm taking the rest!
